content: That's really helpful! For the wine pairings, I think we'll go with the Pinot Noir for the lamb. I've always been a fan of Pinot Noir. For the slideshow, I love the idea of adding captions or quotes to make it more personal. Do you think it's a good idea to include some funny moments or memes that are just between us, or should I stick to more romantic and sentimental photos?
